title: SUPPLEMENTARY MATERIALS FOR Viruses in Vietnamese patients presenting with community acquired sepsis of unknown cause
body:
Scrub typhus Whole-blood PCR IFA of paired sera [3, 4] Rickettsiosis and murine typhus Whole-blood PCR [4, 5] Murine typhus IFA of paired sera [3] Bacteraemia

Whole-blood PCR [6, 7] Hantavirus Serum PCR [8] Japanese encephalitis virus CSF ELISA [9] Mumps
